title: Coursework and Projects
text:
PBOM Transmittal Memo Format
The Boeing Company
Worked alongside Kevin C. (KC) Callahan and Van Ho, from Boeing’s BDS P-8A Estimating and Pricing team, in streamlining Material Estimate documentation by eliminating redundancies in the process.

title: Coursework and Projects
text:
Gaucho Recruiting Zone
UCSB Men’s Soccer Office
Worked alongside Greg Wilson, Associate Head Coach of the UCSB Men’s Soccer team, in designing and photographing new material to create the UCSB Men’s Soccer team’s new official recruiting website for prospective student-athletes to access. Renamed the site to ‘Gaucho Recruiting Zone’ .

title: Work Experience
text:
June 2022 - August 2022
During Boeing’s ten-week Summer 2022 Business Internship Program (BBIP) - Finance, interacted directly with company leaders to discuss finance, strategy, and the future of Boeing. The Boeing Defense, Space & Security (BDS) P-8A Estimating and Pricing team has helped me apply my education to meaningful projects while developing skills in financial acumen, data analytics, financial modeling, emotional intelligence, and problem-solving.

title: Work Experience
text:
Marketing and Public Relations Intern
October 2021 - June 2022
Assisted the Marketing and Public Relations Coordinator in supervising community outreach programs, developing and implementing marketing plans, and increasing support and attendance for Men’s Soccer games. Worked with the Men’s Soccer team’s Associate Head Coach in designing and photographing new material for the team’s official recruiting website.

title: Home
text:
Hello! My name is Kyle Biagan, a UCLA Class of 2024 undergraduate studying towards a Statistics and Data Science B.S.
Post graduation, I am seeking an internship or full-time entry-level position in an innovative, data-centric company within the artificial intelligence (AI), cloud server, enterprise software, or financial/banking industries. I am open to all work environments (in-person, remote, or hybrid).
This website showcases all of my relevant academic and professional experience.
Please explore my hyperlinks and other pages to find out a bit more about me. Thank you!

Contact Information
